mapper.select: SELECT * FROM rsc ORDER BY use_yn DESC, RSC_CD
SELECT rsc_cd, rsc_nm, rsc_spec, mng_unit, rsc_typ, saf_stc, use_yn, vend_cd, vend_nm FROM rsc WHERE rsc_cd = #{rscCd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rsc ( rsc_cd, rsc_nm, rsc_spec, mng_unit, rsc_typ, saf_stc, use_yn, vend_cd, vend_nm ) VALUES ( 'RSC${rscCd}', #{rscNm}, #{rscSpec}, #{mngUnit}, #{rscTyp}, #{safStc}, #{useYn}, #{vendCd}, #{vendNm} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE rsc
rsc_cd = #{rscCd},
rsc_nm = #{rscNm},
rsc_spec = #{rscSpec},
rsc_typ = #{rscTyp},
saf_stc = #{safStc},
use_yn = #{useYn},
vend_cd = #{vendCd},
vend_nm = #{vendNm},
WHERE rsc_cd = #{rscCd}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM rsc_ordr ORDER BY ordr_cd
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rsc_ordr ( ordr_cd, ordr_req_dt, VEND_CD, RSC_CD, ORDR_CNT, PAPRD_CMND_DT, VEND_NM, RSC_NM ) VALUES ( #{ordrCd}, #{ordrReqDt}, #{vendCd}, #{rscCd}, #{ordrCnt}, #{paprdCmndDt}, #{vendNm}, #{rscNm} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE rsc_ordr
ordr_cd = #{ordrCd},
ordr_req_dt = #{ordrReqDt},
VEND_CD = #{vendCd},
VEND_NM = #{vendNm},
RSC_CD = #{rscCd},
RSC_NM = #{rscNm},
ORDR_CNT = #{ordrCnt},

mapper.select: SELECT r.RSC_CD , r.RSC_NM , r.VEND_CD , r.VEND_NM , r.rsc_typ , r.rsc_spec , SUM(i.ist_cnt) AS TOTAL_IST_CNT , SUM(out.ouST_CNT) AS TOTAL_OUST_CNT , (SUM(i.ist_cnt) - SUM(out.ouST_CNT)) AS NET_STC , (SUM(o.ordr_CNT)-SUM(i.IST_CNT)) AS no_iST_CNT , r.saf_stc FROM rsc r LEFT JOIN rsc_ist i ON r.rsc_cd = i.rsc_cd LEFT JOIN rsc_oust out ON r.RSC_CD = out.RSC_CD LEFT JOIN rsc_ordr o ON r.RSC_CD = o.RSC_CD WHERE r.use_yn = 'Yes' GROUP BY r.RSC_CD, r.RSC_NM, r.VEND_CD, r.VEND_NM, r.rsc_typ, r.rsc_spec, r.saf_stc ORDER BY r.RSC_CD

SELECT i.rsc_lot_cd , i.rsc_cd , r.rsc_nm , i.ordr_cd , o.ordr_cnt , i.rsc_insp_cd , i.ist_cnt , i.ist_dt FROM rsc_ist i JOIN rsc r ON i.rsc_cd = r.rsc_cd LEFT JOIN rsc_ordr o ON i.ordr_cd = o.ordr_cd ORDER BY i.rsc_lot_cd
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rsc_ist ( rsc_lot_cd, rsc_cd, ordr_cd, rsc_insp_cd, ist_cnt, ist_dt ) VALUES ( 'RLT${rscLotCd}', #{rscCd}, #{ordrCd}, #{rscInspCd}, #{istCnt}, #{istDt} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE rsc_ist
rsc_lot_cd = #{rscLotCd},
rsc_cd = #{rscCd},
ordr_cd = #{ordrCd},
rsc_insp_cd = #{rscInspCd},
ist_cnt = #{istCnt},
ist_dt = #{istDt},
WHERE rsc_lot_cd = #{rscLotCd}
